key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities, particularly for critical components like semiconductors and rare earth metals
Dependence on government subsidies and renewable energy targets, subject to political and regulatory changes
Geopolitical risks, including the repurposing of a former plant in Russia by Rosatom
controversies: Environmental concerns related to the production and disposal of wind turbine components
Job cuts and restructuring, including the planned reduction of 300 jobs in the UK
environmental_issues: Waste management challenges from the production and disposal of composite wind turbine blades
social_issues: Job cuts and restructuring impacting local operations and workforce
governance_issues: Reliance on government policies and subsidies, which may introduce regulatory risks
